meanings.definition: Looking back on or dealing with past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: The retros photo album brought back memories of our childhood.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of retros nostalgia when visiting her old school.
meanings.sent3: The retros theme party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: His retros analysis of the situation helped him understand what went wrong.
meanings.sent5: The retros view from the hilltop was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A prefix meaning backward or back.
meanings.sent1: The word 'retrospect' uses the retros prefix to mean looking back.
meanings.sent2: In this textbook, the retros prefix is used in various words related to time.
meanings.sent3: The teacher explained the meaning of the retros prefix to the class.
meanings.sent4: The retros prefix can change the entire meaning of a word.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the retros prefix helps in deciphering complex words.
